_header: This is the book of William Tucke
_description: A Book Plate of William Tucke (late fifteenth century) — two couplets

BLAdd10336.Transcription:
This is the boke off William TuckeChrist graunte to hym yn erth good
                    luckeAnd or he dye to send hym graceIn hevyn so hye to purchese a
                    place
BLAdd10336.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.164.
Bennett,  Henry Stanley. 
             England from Chaucer to Caxton.
         London: Methuen, 1928: 161.
